com.milk.objed
Class BaseEditor

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--com.milk.objed.BaseEditor
All Implemented Interfaces:
Editable, Editor
Direct Known Subclasses:
BaseFieldsEditor, DirectValueEditor, FieldValueEditor, MethodValueEditor
public abstract class BaseEditor
extends java.lang.Object
implements Editor, Editable

This is a base class that handles a lot of stuff for editors. Among other things, it manages the listener list. Also, it implements the Editable interface to refer to itself, as opposed to creating an editor for the innards of the object itself.

Author:
Dan Bornstein, danfuzz@milk.com
, Copyright 1999 Dan Bornstein, all rights reserved.
